sentences.en: Aaron and Spook, to camp out in his backyard.
sentences.cn: 亚伦和斯布克, 在他家后庭院野营.

sentences.en: At night, he would creep out of the house like a spook.
sentences.cn: 夜间, 他常常像幽灵一般地从家里偷偷地出来.

sentences.en: Creepy thoughts crept into Spook's head.
sentences.cn: 恐惧的感觉像爬虫一样爬进斯布克的脑中.

sentences.en: Don't let the repoter spook you, and you have to behave urbanely.
sentences.cn: 别让记者缠住你, 而你还得举止文雅.

sentences.en: First you have to die, maybe tragically, then leave part of your soul hanging around earth to spook relatives and haunt houses.
sentences.cn: 首先你先要死去，最好是惨死，之后，将你部分的灵魂留在地球上，出没于鬼屋并且家人附近。

sentences.en: I am not a spook like those who haunted Edgar Allan Poe.
sentences.cn: 我不是缠磨着埃德加·爱伦·坡的那种幽灵.

sentences.en: I can spook a letter for you, if necessary.
sentences.cn: 如果有必要,我可以代你写封信的.

sentences.en: Its plunging stock price threatened spook customers and imperil the bank.
sentences.cn: 花旗暴跌的股价可能会令客户惶恐不安、令该行陷入危险中.

sentences.en: Or round in circles, added Spook.
sentences.cn: “或者在转圈.”斯布克加了一句.

sentences.en: Spook ( ghost ) writers are planted and recruited in politics the media etc.
sentences.cn: 鬼 ( 幽灵 ) 作家被政治家,媒体等所栽培并征募.

sentences.en: Spook's stories always involved the walking dead and headless monsters.
sentences.cn: 斯布克的故事里总是包含行走的尸体和无头怪物.
“为什么 呢 ?”斯布克耸了耸肩说.

sentences.en: Why don't you go inside, Spook? said Aaron.
sentences.cn: “你为什么不进去看个究竟, 斯布克? ”亚伦说.

sentences.en: Wonder what they're having back at camp, said Spook.
sentences.cn: 斯布克说:“想知道我们在露营地能有什么东西. ”

sentences.en: Xia zhi xing : unique skill for love 1 : spook house.
sentences.cn: 夏之星: 恋爱必杀技一:鬼屋.

words.tran_cn: 幽灵般的；有鬼般的；令人毛骨悚然的

trans.tran_cn: 鬼，幽灵，<俚>出没无常行踪古怪的人，间谍
鬼怪般地出没，吓唬，恐吓，（因受惊吓而）逃窜
